channel.title: ZuneScape Development Team - Now Recruiting
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i185.photobucket.com/albums/x107/zunescape/ZuneScape.png[/img]
[b][size=14pt]ZuneScape Development Team[/size][/b]
[b]As the people who signed up know, ZuneScape has been cancelled. But I have changed my mind. While stumbling across a source called Backtolumby EX, I decided that I will use that as the base. Unfortunatly someone screwed up our forums. So I am not only hiring Server Coders. But now I am hiring Web Designers too. If you are interested, please use the forum listed below in "Code:"[/b]
The old topic was closed due to flaming. The link is located below. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,177396.msg1625981.html#msg1625981]Old Topic[/url]
The forums have been created and hopefully are the main forums. Please stand by for the ZuneScape home page.
[url=http://zunescape.ipbfree.com]ZuneScape Forums[/url]
I am still currently looking for a theme that suits me, So please if you are an excellent theme maker, contact me.
[b]NOTICE! I am being strict when hiring people. Please do not ask to become an Administrator or a Moderator, you will only ruin your chance of ever becoming one.[/b]
[b]Updates:[/b]
Added a new position The source that will be used was changed from FireScape v4 to Backtolumby EX The forums theme has been changed Client Coders has been reduced to 3 openings Web Development has been reduced to 2 openings
[b]If you do not respond within 3 days of sining up, I will automaticly remove you.[/b]
[code] What placement do you wish to have: Why do you wish to sign up: Are you reliable and up for the job: Background experience (Atleast 5 sentences): Best method of contacting (Must be an instant message program): [/code]
Names on the list have 4 stages. Each are color coded. Blue: Just signed up. (Lasts for 1 day) Red: Has not responded yet. Green: Currently doing his/her job. Orange: Job status pending.
[b]NOTICE TO ALL SERVER CODERS! Server Coders must be experienced. They can not be a first time coder and must have advanced knowledge on how to add things. If you wish to recieve the server, please PM me so I can upload it or send it to you via an instant messaging program.[/b]
Server Coders must be able to do the following.
Fully working specials with the real special bar filling and depleting. All skills working with minimal or no bugs. Must be able to create quests. Have windows open when clicking on objects, buttons and quests. Wilderness levels working correctly. Hitpoints slowly increase over time. And alot more... Please ask for a list of the things I want to be added/fixed.
[b]Server Coders: (Expert coders are guaranteed a spot over anyone else)[/b][/center] 1. Ultimacool 2. rudeboy33 3. Inmate™ 4. ChemicalReaction™ 5. Dha12oks
[center][b]Client Coders:[/b][/center] 1. GalaxyScape 2. 3.
[center][b]Graphic Designers:[/b][/center] 1. 2. 3.
[center][b][s]Web Development:[/s] (FULL!)[/b][/center] 1. The Moose 2. Sick of Air
[center][b][s]Testers:[/s] (FULL!)[/b][/center] 1. Zammy!! 2. runeshawn11
After you sign up, please message me though PM or instant messaging. I am not always online on these. So please stand by if I do not respond. I do check this atleast 2 times a day.
AIM: thedarktwo4923 YIM: thedarktwo4923@yahoo.com MSN: the-muffinator@hotmail.com
Sincerely, Zune/Muffinator
Server Information: Server IP: zunescape.servegame.com Port: 43594
Please ask me to put the server up for testing. I do not feel like running it all day.

item.title: ZuneScape Development Team - Now Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]ZuneScape Development Team[/size]

As the people who signed up know, ZuneScape has been cancelled. But I have changed my mind. While stumbling across a source called Backtolumby EX, I decided that I will use that as the base. Unfortunatly someone screwed up our forums. So I am not only hiring Server Coders. But now I am hiring Web Designers too. If you are interested, please use the forum listed below in “Code:”

The old topic was closed due to flaming. The link is located below.
Old Topic

The forums have been created and hopefully are the main forums. Please stand by for the ZuneScape home page.

ZuneScape Forums

I am still currently looking for a theme that suits me, So please if you are an excellent theme maker, contact me.

NOTICE! I am being strict when hiring people. Please do not ask to become an Administrator or a Moderator, you will only ruin your chance of ever becoming one.

Updates:

Added a new position
The source that will be used was changed from FireScape v4 to Backtolumby EX
The forums theme has been changed
Client Coders has been reduced to 3 openings
Web Development has been reduced to 2 openings

If you do not respond within 3 days of sining up, I will automaticly remove you.

What placement do you wish to have:
Why do you wish to sign up:
Are you reliable and up for the job:
Background experience (Atleast 5 sentences):
Best method of contacting (Must be an instant message program):

Names on the list have 4 stages. Each are color coded.
Blue: Just signed up. (Lasts for 1 day)
Red: Has not responded yet.
Green: Currently doing his/her job.
Orange: Job status pending.

NOTICE TO ALL SERVER CODERS! Server Coders must be experienced. They can not be a first time coder and must have advanced knowledge on how to add things. If you wish to recieve the server, please PM me so I can upload it or send it to you via an instant messaging program.

Server Coders must be able to do the following.

Fully working specials with the real special bar filling and depleting.
All skills working with minimal or no bugs.
Must be able to create quests.
Have windows open when clicking on objects, buttons and quests.
Wilderness levels working correctly.
Hitpoints slowly increase over time.
And alot more… Please ask for a list of the things I want to be added/fixed.

Server Coders: (Expert coders are guaranteed a spot over anyone else)[/center]

  1. Ultimacool
  2. rudeboy33
  3. Inmate™
  4. ChemicalReaction™
  5. Dha12oks

[center]Client Coders:[/center]

  1. GalaxyScape

[center]Graphic Designers:[/center]
1.
2.
3.

[center]Web Development: (FULL!)[/center]

  1. The Moose
  2. Sick of Air

[center]Testers: (FULL!)[/center]

  1. Zammy!!
  2. runeshawn11

After you sign up, please message me though PM or instant messaging. I am not always online on these. So please stand by if I do not respond. I do check this atleast 2 times a day.

AIM: thedarktwo4923
YIM: thedarktwo4923@yahoo.com
MSN: the-muffinator@hotmail.com

Sincerely, Zune/Muffinator

Server Information:
Server IP: zunescape.servegame.com
Port: 43594

Please ask me to put the server up for testing. I do not feel like running it all day.
